actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Clockwork Dragon

specialTraits.description: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.
specialTraits.name: False Appearance
